Player Command
==============

See: ` <color.html>`_ ` <colours.html>`_ ` <simplify.html>`_ 

USAGE

  |  ``mode``
  |  ``mode plain``
  |  ``mode vt100``
  |  ``mode xterm``
  |  ``mode ansi``

Typing ``mode`` will show if your character is set to receive ansi codes
from the MUD (used to display colours).
